oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |han=kass'o relates the story of the flood at Victoria West, observed by =kuken-an and |han=kass'o's wife, Ssuobba-||ken (Sara), who were both at Victoria West at the time it happened. The rain carried all the things and the people away down the river bed and some where crushed by collapsing houses. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-23.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Flood at Victoria West
